data.title: Eh... as always.
data.text:
I try not to be picky. I will eat most anything lol and this food is not TERRIBLE. Its just nothing to rave about. Ita average. I always order chicken taco dinners no matter which mexican restaurant i go to. And here ...the decor is always great. A very large place. Always clean but i never really seen it packed or busy. Nice and quiet :) came here for a quick bite before working around 530pm. 
Food was brought out quick. Chicken taco dinner: Shells werent toasty or crisp but were a big soggy. Chicken was mostly thigh (i like all meats) but it tasted...like leftovers. Like reheated ...gamie? Lioe they boiled it with no spices. Rice was ok. Beans could use more flavors. Over all it was ok for the low price. Better than paying for fast food.

data.title: Quick and filling
data.text: Stopped by during for lunch. Not to busy. Got chips and salsa very quick. Ordered burrito dinner. Meal didn't take long, but they always put gravy over them. Meal was good. See them next time.

data.title: Terrible service, food below average
data.text: The server seemed liked we were inconveniencing her when we asked specific questions about the food. Simple question, "are the chicken enchiladas made with breast meat or not?" She said yes, but they absolutely were not. Food isn't worth spending your money on. Stay away!

data.title: not good eats
data.text: had dinner the food was not that good the server was ok but the hostess was real bad had to wait 15 minuets to pay the bill and some people left without paying as they got tired of waiting in line without a bill  the food was not that good as my wife brother- in- law and I had something different to eat and none of us liked verywell

data.title: Not very good
data.text:
Service was mediocre at best.   Poorly managed.

My meal was completely forgettable.   Nothing memorable.   Not cheap enough to get by on value alone.

Likely would not return.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Must try the cheese and gravy. I think it is worth going there just for that, but all the food is good .....

data.title: Going downhill....
data.text:
This used to be a good cheap relatively authentic Mexican "restaurant " but in recent times the food has increased in price while going down in quality.  Service  and hygiene are questionable too.

There's lots of completion so I recommend you look elsewhere....

data.title: Horrible STAFF want to eat comfortable don't come here.
data.text: Me, My Brother and my friend walk in seat ourselves. Bus boy comes brings us our chips salsa (SALSA WAS OKAY) bus boy very nice brought us extra silverware. Waited for waitress to come take our order for drinks finally got up and asked a some girl not in uniform behind counter if we could get drinks she give me a dirty look and precedes to the kitchen then waitress finally comes out she takes our order for drinks we also order good worried if we'd wouldn't see her again for another 20-30 min . We ordered 3 enchiladas meals two red 1 green. Food comes 20 min later all of the enchiladas are red. I send mine back ofcourse I get dirty looks and she returns shortly with my green enchiladas I begin to eat and notice the just transferred the meat for the red enchilada to the my green one I could taste and see it. There lazy and most of the staff looked drunk I'd never go back to this place I shouldn't of paid but I wanted to just get out of there fast. Place is so beautiful with better staff I think I would enjoyed my time  there . Instead of feeling like I'm being judged or frowned upon.

data.title: PLEASE, I know there have got to be better Mexican Restaurants
data.text:
Well- It happens. Our local family brought us here. It was not GOD AWFUL it was just low-mediocre Mexican. The place is nicely decorated and the service was fine -- and yes I know Stockton is not SF or LA --and yes it is a depressed city... BUT, there are people willing to go out if there was a place to go.

Avoid this place.

data.title: Coastal Mexico
data.text: Adequate portions of authenic well seasoned mexican  food and a good selection of mexican beer.  The atmosphere is classic bus station and somewhat noisy at lunch time.
